title: ［#Eye4HK Campaign 一觸即發］已有名人強勢加盟！今晚八點正，約定大家喺各大社交媒體見，發動全球文宣！！

replies.msg:
Post 1: https://lih.kg/1491510
Post 2: https://lih.kg/1492195




大家好，我地係 Eye For Hong Kong Campaign #Eye4HK
承蒙大家支持，本活動已經蓄勢待發！

經過一輪趕工，我地欣然宣佈：
網絡紅人 上帝話會幫手，HKFP 撰稿人 Richard Scotford 亦已經上傳個人自拍！


南韓藝人金義聖先生 (ig: lunatheboy) 亦繼續出心出力，請大家立刻follow，多謝佢支持！



以下有幾點活動最新事項，希望大家留意：

1. 請務必加Tags！

- 用手掩右眼自拍一張
- 將相片連同英文Post及hashtag上載到Facebook、Instagram、Twitter、Reddit 等，並tag至少3個香港朋友及2個海外朋友，再Retweet，如此類推。
- 請大家務必要tag 至少4-5個朋友，有外國朋友就盡tag，令事件一路滾落去

Post完靚樣，謹記要加Tags，如果唔係就無人見到你個靚樣㗎喇

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK


2. 人面識別問題

知道大家都好擔心白色恐怖，不過運動開始以來，相信大家都有喺社交平台post過反送中資訊。其實如果大家嘅Facebook ig Account係公開的話，就等於默許咗資訊可以被取用，所以大家一定要 set 好 Privacy！
只要 Privacy set 得好，個campaign 係無特別安全問題。如果大家好擔心，歡迎開新Account 瘋狂洗版！

另外，歡迎大家著齊full gear 戴埋手套影，只要大家手勢一樣，用手掩蓋右眼就得。前線手足自行評估參與風險，今次絕對係和理非要connect 國際嘅campagin，重點亦都係要多外國人參與，前線唔直接上載自己樣，可以用公仔代替。
仲係好有顧慮嘅話，唔自己參加，都煩請推比外國朋友知呀！


已經有知道大家都已經迫不及待
請立刻上我地嘅Official IG Page @eye4hk，follow 最新名人自拍：
https://www.instagram.com/eye4hk?r=nametag




今日晚上八點正 21-8-2019 20:00
#Eye4HK Campaign，發動全球 #Eye4HK 文宣！！







818 8pm

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

約定大家！

English Version


Eye for HongKong Campaign



“The bill is dead”, following the non-legal binding announcement made by HK Chief Executive Carrie Lam on the extradition bill, the city is dying too. HKSAR Government refuses to officially withdraw the bill nor set up an independent commission of inquiry to look into the saga. In response to the voices of people, HK police collude with triads to beat citizens indiscriminately (both peaceful protestors and non-protestors). A young girl, who volunteered herself to be a first-aider in a peaceful protest on 11 Aug 2019, was shot in the right eye by the police causing permanent vision loss. The authority is creating violence every day and using brutality to rule the city.


The universal values that everyone on Earth embraces: freedom, justice, rule of law... are at stake now in Hong Kong. Our eyes can be taken, but truth can’t be. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for HongKong Campaign”: 


1. Take a selfie with your right eye covered. Consider wearing a mask, which symbolizes Hong Kong people’s fear of expression, if you wish
2. Upload the photo to Facebook/Instagram/Twitter/Reddit 
3. Tag at least 4 friends of yours and call for their support
4. Add the following hashtag:

#EyeforHK
#Eye4HK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

Our official Instagram Page:
https://www.instagram.com/eye4hk?r=nametag


See you tonight at 8pm!

Korean Version


Eye For Hong Kong Campaign




먼저 연예인 김의성 님과 한국 연예계는 행동으로 홍콩을 응원해 주셔서 감사합니다.

홍콩을 응원하고 싶으시면 RT만 하지 마시고, 셀카를 업로드 하시고 친구를 부르시고 같이 업로드 하세요.

어떻게 찍어도 괜찮으세요. 마스크를 써도 되시고 헬멧을 써도 괜찮으세요. 다만 손으로 어른 눈을 감고 찍으세요.

Facebook(페이스북)에서 업로드 해도 되고 Twitter (트위터), Reddit (레딧)에서 에서 업로드해도 상관이 없으세요.

8월21일 오후 8시부터 같이 사진을 업로드 하세요!

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

各位巴打絲打，頂住呀！
路還很長，記住齊上齊落！
香港人可攻可守！智勇雙全！
記住永不分化！不割蓆！不篤灰！
It’s now or never

大家推上熱門！！

818 8pm
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

821 靜坐

824 觀塘

個Eye4HK Challenge邊個天才諗出嚟架！？

叫人自拍擺上網？咁唔駛出動國安黑警去現場影相啦，全部參加者都自拍走去自投羅網

單單一幅遮右眼相當然唔足以證明有出席過遊行示威衝擊。但唔排除啲仆街智能燈柱會影咗示威者嘅口罩相，跟住強國出動龐大電腦系統對照番呢啲遮右眼相做對比，對啱之後再搵仆街Facebook HK 出賣示威者account 個人資料IP，再交俾黑警拉人！

呢啲on9 challenge唔應該share

어떻게 찍어도 괜찮으세요. 마스크를 써도 되시고 헬멧을 써도 괜찮으세요. 다만 손으로 어른 눈을 감고 찍으세요.

Facebook(페이스북)에서 업로드 해도 되고 Twitter (트위터), Reddit (레딧)에서 에서 업로드해도 상관이 없으세요.

8월21일 오후 8시부터 같이 사진을 업로드 하세요!

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

大家好，我地係 Eye For Hong Kong Campaign #Eye4HK
承蒙大家支持，本活動已經蓄勢待發！

經過一輪趕工，我地欣然宣佈：
網絡紅人 上帝話會幫手，HKFP 撰稿人 Richard Scotford 亦已經上傳個人自拍！


南韓藝人金義聖先生 (ig: lunatheboy) 亦繼續出心出力，請大家立刻follow，多謝佢支持！



以下有幾點活動最新事項，希望大家留意：

1. 請務必加Tags！

- 用手掩右眼自拍一張
- 將相片連同英文Post及hashtag上載到Facebook、Instagram、Twitter、Reddit 等，並tag至少3個香港朋友及2個海外朋友，再Retweet，如此類推。
- 請大家務必要tag 至少4-5個朋友，有外國朋友就盡tag，令事件一路滾落去

Post完靚樣，謹記要加Tags，如果唔係就無人見到你個靚樣㗎喇

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK


2. 人面識別問題

知道大家都好擔心白色恐怖，不過運動開始以來，相信大家都有喺社交平台post過反送中資訊。其實如果大家嘅Facebook ig Account係公開的話，就等於默許咗資訊可以被取用，所以大家一定要 set 好 Privacy！
只要 Privacy set 得好，個campaign 係無特別安全問題。如果大家好擔心，歡迎開新Account 瘋狂洗版！

另外，歡迎大家著齊full gear 戴埋手套影，只要大家手勢一樣，用手掩蓋右眼就得。前線手足自行評估參與風險，今次絕對係和理非要connect 國際嘅campagin，重點亦都係要多外國人參與，前線唔直接上載自己樣，可以用公仔代替。
仲係好有顧慮嘅話，唔自己參加，都煩請推比外國朋友知呀！


已經有知道大家都已經迫不及待
請立刻上我地嘅Official IG Page @eye4hk，follow 最新名人自拍：
https://www.instagram.com/eye4hk?r=nametag




今日晚上八點正 21-8-2019 20:00
#Eye4HK Campaign，發動全球 #Eye4HK 文宣！！







818 8pm

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NoPoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK

約定大家！

=========================
Eye4HK活動
用右手掩蓋右眼自拍，連同本文字hashtag上傳至Facebook, Instagram, Twitter等各大社交網站，並tag至少三位香港朋友及兩位海外朋友一同參與此活動。

“The bill is dead”, following the non-legal binding announcement made by HK Chief Executive Carrie Lam on the extradition bill, the city is dying too. HKSAR Government refuses to officially withdraw the bill nor set up an independent commission of inquiry to look into the saga. In response to the voices of people, HK police collude with triads to beat citizens indiscriminately (both peaceful protestors and non-protestors). A young girl, who volunteered herself to be a first-aider in a peaceful protest on 11 Aug 2019, was shot in the right eye by the police causing permanent vision loss. The authority is creating violence every day and using brutality to rule the city.

The universal values that everyone on Earth embraces: freedom, justice, rule of law... are at stake now in Hong Kong. Our eyes can be taken, but truth can’t be. To show your support to Hong Kong, please join the “Eye for HongKong Campaign”:

1. Take a selfie with your right eye covered. Consider wearing a mask, which symbolizes Hong Kong people’s fear of expression, if you wish
2. Upload the photo to Facebook/Instagram/Twitter/Reddit
3. Tag at least 4 friends of yours and call for their support
4. Add the following hashtag:

#Eye4HK
#EyeforHK
#NopoliceBrutality
#FreeFromFear
#DemocracyForHK
